amendment.description: To award the gold medals to the next of kin of surviving members, as appropriate, and to designate the gold medals as numismatic items.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2344 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2344 proposed by Senator Donnelly for Senator Brown.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2344 proposed by Senator Donnelly for Senator Brown.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2344 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
